## ProductTierPrices interface

ProductTierPrices is deprecated and has been replaced by TierPrice. The ProductTierPrices object defines a tier price, which is a quantity discount offered to a specific customer group.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductTierPrices 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [customer\_group\_id?](./magento-api.producttierprices.customer_group_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the customer group. |
|  [percentage\_value?](./magento-api.producttierprices.percentage_value.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The percentage discount of the item. |
|  [qty?](./magento-api.producttierprices.qty.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The number of items that must be purchased to qualify for tier pricing. |
|  [value?](./magento-api.producttierprices.value.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price of the fixed price item. |
|  [website\_id?](./magento-api.producttierprices.website_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID assigned to the website. |
